coding_practice.title: Increasing Triplet Subsequence
coding_practice.description: Given an integer array nums, return true if there exists a triple of indices (i, j, k) such that i < j < k and nums[i] < nums[j] < nums[k]. If no such indices exists, return false.

examples.explanation: Any triplet where i < j < k is valid.
One of the valid triplet is (3, 4, 5), because nums[3] == 0 < nums[4] == 4 < nums[5] == 6.

coding_practice.follow up: Could you implement a solution that runs in O(n) time complexity and O(1) space complexity?
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用兩個變數 first 和 second 分別保存目前最小和次小值。
2. 遍歷 nums，若 num <= first，更新 first。
3. 若 first < num <= second，更新 second。
4. 若 num > second，表示找到一個遞增三元組，返回 True。
5. 遍歷完仍未找到，返回 False。
